content: like a rosebud in springtime this pattern brings new life to a perennial favorite the newly revamped in the garden shawl deluxe combines texture and lace with a self-striping yarn to create a uniquely beautiful piece that you ll reach for again and again **skill** knitting **difficulty** intermediate **sizes** one size **finished measurements** wingspan 66 depth at center 32 **materials** **universal yarn** *deluxe stripes* 1 75% superwash wool 25% nylon 100g/218 yds 305 fresh figs mc 2 skeins **universal yarn** *deluxe worsted* 2 100% wool 100g/220 yds 12275 mulberry cc 2 skeins needle us size 7 4 5 mm 32 or longer circular to accommodate large number of stitches or size needed to obtain gauge notions stitch markers tapestry needle **gauge** 17 sts x 23 row = 4 in stockinette stitch st st after blocking save time check your gauge **pattern notes** this shawl is worked from the top down starting with a garter tab cast on a knitted-on border is worked perpendicular to the body of the shawl the stitch patterns are both written and charted for your convenience slip all stitches purlwise unless otherwise indicated 1 https //universalyarn com/products/dstripes 2 https //universalyarn com/products/dwn
